hadiths.text: Narrated Ubai bin Ka'b: that he heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saying, "(Moses) said, 'Call me not to account for what I forget and be not hard upon me for my affair (with you)' (18.73) the first excuse of Moses was his forgetfulness

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ إِذَا حَنِثَ نَاسِيًا فِي الأَيْمَانِ
chapter.eng-name: If someone does something against his oath due to forgetfulness
